To be fair though, every new champ has thrown a wrench in the meta. So they cant have an easy time doing balance when every 6 weeks to 2 months something that creates new harder to understand problems into the meta.

Typically we see after a new champ comes out a large amount of patch notes dedicated to them for the next few patches so they can never really catch up and fix season long issues.

They're separate teams so making new champs doesn't take away from time spent on game balance, but here's the problem:

_Pumping out new champions just adds more shit to balance._
